H0.text: Who on TV has played a scarecrow and a Time Lord. Tom Baker

A4.text: He is best known for portraying the Tenth and Fourteenth Doctor in Doctor Who (2005–2010)

A5.text: He is best known for portraying the ninth incarnation of the Doctor in the BBC series Doctor Who (2005)

A6.text: He played the title character in Worzel Gummidge (1979–1981 and 1987–1989)
